Packages 
Package Description
sci.crayfis.shramp
The intent of the (Sh)ower (R)econstructing (A)pplication for (M)obile (P)hones, or ShRAMP, is to detect extensive air shower radiation using camera sensors.
sci.crayfis.shramp.analysis
This package contains the classes for performing analyses on pixel image data, e.g.
sci.crayfis.shramp.battery
The classes in this package interface with the smartphone battery hardware to determine battery status, charge level, temperature and other metrics if available.
sci.crayfis.shramp.camera2
This package contains all the classes directly involved with camera and image capture operation.
sci.crayfis.shramp.camera2.capture
This package specializes on camera capture, i.e.
sci.crayfis.shramp.camera2.characteristics
The classes in this package work as partitioned team to discover all abilities of the current camera hardware, and as needed, select for those that are optimum for this application.
sci.crayfis.shramp.camera2.requests
The classes in this package work as a team to assemble a capture request with optimal settings for this application, given the choices determined in the sci.crayfis.shramp.camera2.characteristics package.
sci.crayfis.shramp.camera2.util
The utilities contained in this package are for encapsulating/print-formatting camera abilities (i.e.
sci.crayfis.shramp.error
This package might not exist in the future.
sci.crayfis.shramp.logging
This package is slated for a major overhaul.
sci.crayfis.shramp.sensor
The classes in this package interface with all sensor hardware on the smartphone.
sci.crayfis.shramp.ssh
This package handled all data uploads/downloads/SSH commands, but is currently disabled while I finish calibration problems.
sci.crayfis.shramp.surfaces
The classes in this package are output surfaces for images captured by the camera.
sci.crayfis.shramp.ui
This package is currently not used, but the idea was to put GUI-based user notifications here.
sci.crayfis.shramp.util
General utilities and miscellaneous classes notably including time/date, memory and internal storage management.
